name: My Secret World
overview: More than just a diary, it's about a game to express your personality while having fun. Not only can you keep your events in the interactive agenda, you can also: express yourself in the diary, which is fully customizable like an interactive scrapbook know yourself better with dozens of fun quizzes and your personality star socialize with your friends trading tons of customization elements, sharing secrets, taking quizzes together or playing mini-games A Fully Customizable Diary Keep your secrets safe by locking your game with a secret code Store up to 150 pages in your diary Customize your pages with more than 500 items (backgrounds, photos, stickers, pins, etc) like an interactive scrapbook More than 240 special pages where you are invited to write about specific topics in line with your profile and your mood Note all your important events in the agenda
